name: stdlib-datasets-penguins
title: Palmer Penguins
description: The Palmer Penguins dataset, collected and made available by Dr. Kristen Gorman and the Palmer Station, Antarctica LTER, a member of the Long Term Ecological Research Network.

resources.name: penguins-json
resources.title: Palmer Penguins
resources.description: The Palmer Penguins dataset, collected and made available by Dr. Kristen Gorman and the Palmer Station, Antarctica LTER.

resources.name: penguins-csv
resources.title: Palmer Penguins
resources.description: The Palmer Penguins dataset, collected and made available by Dr. Kristen Gorman and the Palmer Station, Antarctica LTER.

fields.name: studyName
fields.title: Study
fields.description: Sampling expedition from which data were collected.

fields.name: sampleNumber
fields.title: Sample Number
fields.description: An integer denoting the continuous numbering sequence for each sample.

fields.name: species
fields.title: Species
fields.description: A string denoting whether the observation belongs to an Adelie, Chinstrap or a Gentoo Penguin.

fields.name: region
fields.title: Region
fields.description: A string denoting the region of Palmer LTER sampling grid.

fields.name: island
fields.title: Island
fields.description: Island name (Dream, Torgersen, or Biscoe) in the Palmer Archipelago (Antarctica).

fields.name: stage
fields.title: Stage
fields.description: A string denoting reproductive stage at sampling.

fields.name: individualID
fields.title: Individual ID
fields.description: A string denoting the unique ID for each individual in dataset.

fields.name: clutchCompletion
fields.title: Clutch Completion
fields.description: A string denoting if the study nest was observed with a full clutch, i.e., 2 eggs.

fields.name: dateEgg
fields.title: Date Egg
fields.description: The date when the study nest was observed with 1 egg.

fields.name: culmenLength
fields.title: Culmen Length
fields.description: The length of the dorsal ridge of a bird's bill (millimeters).

fields.name: culmenDepth
fields.title: Culmen Depth
fields.description: The depth of the dorsal ridge of a bird's bill (millimeters).

fields.name: bodyMass
fields.title: Body Mass (gm)
fields.description: The penguin's body mass in grams.

fields.name: delta15N
fields.title: Delta 15 N
fields.description: The measure of the ratio of stable isotopes 15N:14N.

fields.name: delta13C
fields.title: Delta 13 C
fields.description: The measure of the ratio of stable isotopes 13C:12C.

fields.name: comments
fields.title: Comments
fields.description: Additional relevant information for the observation.
